item.title: The Power of Loop: A Surprising Twist in Task Syncing
item.description: Spoiler alert: this blog post has a twist ending that you will NEVER see coming! Okay, maybe you will see it coming if you’d paid attention to some of Microsoft’s newer tools, but I’m getting ahead of myself. The Use Case I had a user come to me asking for help building her first Power Automate flow, and what she wanted was pretty ambitious for a beginner. So, I jumped in and helped build out a POC based on her use case.
